roleset.name: provide an active link to a website
roleset.note: HYPERLINK-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from hyperlink.01-v)

role.descr: focus of linking, document containing the hyperlink

example.name: Site your sources!
example.text: When reproducing, please be sure *PRO*-3 to hyperlink the original source and the author's information.
example.arg: the original source and the author's information
